description:
Don't pass the buck ... do the right thing instead! This fun and lighthearted tee has all the feels—soft organic and recycled polyester handfeel along with the feel-good knowledge that it was made in a Fair Trade Certified™ Factory.

For an added bonus, it's lightweight and breathable too. Now that's a graphic tee we can all get behind.
name: Prana Buck Wild Journeyman 2 - Slim - Mens
